name: NEO CROSSER
description:
Are you tired of staring at the clock waiting for time to pass? Are you bored of being bored in English class? Are you ready for the next evolution of Crossy Road? Introducing NEO CROSSER, the perfect time waster. 

The goal is simple: run as far as you can without dying. But obtaining the goal is far from easy.  From buildings, to cars, to landslides, to laser firing ufos and tanks, a vast array of obstacles block your path. 

Features:

  • Runs completely in the browser (no download required!)
  • Simple gameplay: easy to learn, hard to master
  • Endless random levels with scaling difficulty
  • Many different types of obstacles
  • Access to 3 dynamic abilities
  • Checkpoint and scoreboard systems
  • Each round should take 2-8 minutes = perfect for quickly playing
  • Minimalist + low CPU/GPU usage = doesn't use many system resources
  • Can play with one hand (and no mouse required to play)

If there are any bugs with the game, contact me at lelserslasers@gmail.com.
